fields.name: Shiro jacket
fields.description:
White denim with vintage kimono silk panelling, subtle shades of mountain mist grey, warm cream and sakura pink with a modern minimalist sakura bonsai art print on the rear.

Kyō-Yūzen kimono silk designs favour architectural framing, seasonal florals, and layered scenes.

Mixing elegance with modern kawaii culture.
fields.care_instructions: Hand wash only, do not tumble dry
